document.full_text: apple inc said it would roll out its newest ipad to 25 more markets this week, including france and the united kingdom, but did not provide any hard figures for sales so far in the united states.
document.title: apple's ipad 2 to hit 25 new markets this week
lines_and_colors: apple inc said it would roll out its newest ipad to 25 more markets this week, including france and the united kingdom, but did not provide any hard figures for sales so far in the united states.
